post.author: 부기흡
post.content:
This is to share the information regarding a planned recruiting visit by Samsung Electronics. Samsung Electronics is planning to visit Toronto on May 19, 2005 to recruit excellent scientists and engineers in the Greater Toronto Area.

Please find the attached file for more detailed information about the hire.

The visit is scheduled as follows:

When:    18:00 - 21:00 May 19, 2005 (Thu)
Where:   Seoul House
        3220 Dufferin St. #1A
        Tel: (416) 782-4405

Thank you.

Chi-Guhn Lee
post.title: Samsung Electronics Recruiting Visit
